content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China. He was interested in renting an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment. I was seeking the highest possible price for my property, while the tenant, being a student, was looking for a price that fit his budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] If yes, the final price was not agreed upon. The last proposed price from the tenant was 600 Euro per month, which I deemed unsatisfactory.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 7. The potential tenant was polite and respectful, but his unwillingness to offer a higher price made it difficult to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] If yes, I did not feel discriminated or offended. The potential tenant's behavior did not have any discriminatory or offensive elements.
name: Peter Schmidt
